text: "Dangerous Mindz" is the first single released from the Gravediggaz' second album, The Pick, the Sickle and the Shovel. Produced by RZA (The Rzarector) and the 4th Disciple, Dangerous Mindz was the group's first single to not make it to any Billboard charts. A music video stylized after the album's cover was released to promote the single. ==Track listing== ===A-Side=== #"Dangerous Mindz" (Radio Edit)- 4:43 #"Dangerous Mindz" (Album Version)- 4:54 ===B-Side=== #"Dangerous Mindz" (Instrumental)- 4:54 #"Dangerous Mindz" (Accapella)- 4:40 ==External links== * Category:1997 singles Category:1997 songs Category:Gravediggaz songs Category:Hardcore hip hop songs Category:Horrorcore songs
title: Dangerous Mindz
